name: The Secret of Monkey Island: Special Edition
description:
This script will facilitate you install of this game on Linux OS:
"The Secret of Monkey Island - Special Edition" provided by GOG using Lutris Wine runner. 
During install please let all options by default.
Thanks to the people who helped us play this game in the best conditions on Linux platform.
notes:
- Press F10 to change classic/modern version.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

script.custom-name: The Secret of Monkey Island - Special Edition - GOG

files.gogsetup: N/A:Select the setup exe file downloaded from your GOG account.

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Secret of Monkey Island - Special Edition/MISE.exe

merge.dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/The Secret of Monkey Island - Special Edition

execute.command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/The Secret of Monkey Island - Special Edition/"; rm -f -r __support goggame-1207666253.* Language.exe webcache.zip;

content:
custom-name: The Secret of Monkey Island - Special Edition - GOG
files:
- inno: http://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/snapshots/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
- gogsetup: N/A:Select the setup exe file downloaded from your GOG account.
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Secret of Monkey Island - Special Edition/MISE.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/innoextract
    file: inno
- execute:
    args: --extract $gogsetup --output-dir "$CACHE/"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/The Secret of Monkey Island - Special Edition
    src: $CACHE/app
- task:
    app: xact d3dx9_41
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/The Secret of Monkey Island - Special
      Edition/"; rm -f -r __support goggame-1207666253.* Language.exe webcache.zip;
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: csmt
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000000'
wine:
  Desktop: true
  version: lutris-5.0-x86_64
